title: Masayume Chasing - Fairy Tail フェアリーテイル OP 15
lyrics: Tone    Yume wo otte mayoi -konda ko -koro no mori no oku Ka- gami yori sun- da izumi ut- suru yuganda smile Koboreta namida wa (don't cry) kin demo gin demo nakute Arifu -reta namida (fall from my eyes) megami mo kizuka- nai Masayume chasing chasing Ko- ero motto jibun shijou saikou no Ima wo chasing chasing sou egaita Jibun ni natte mo- yase mune no hi wo Na na na na na na na oh! Na na na na na hey! hey! Na na na na na na na oh! Kakenukero hero Na na na na na na na oh! Na na na na na hey! hey! Na na na (hey!) na na na oh! Moyase mune no hi wo (My life... yeah)
